text: Reba Kirson Monness was a female United States international table tennis player. She won a bronze medal at the 1947 World Table Tennis Championships in the women's team and a silver medal in the women's doubles with Mae Clouther. She was inducted into the USA Table Tennis Hall of Fame in 1981. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:American female table tennis players Category:1980 deaths Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Reba Monness
